*.hex
*.cof

*.o
*.lst
*.map
*.err
*.sym
*.esym
*.tre
*.pre

# MPLAB Files
*.mcp
*.mcw
*.mcs
*.mptags
*~

# Proteus Simulation Files
*.PWI
*.DBK
*.DSN~

*.LOG
*.DDF

# Temporary Files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.swp
*~

# OS Generated Files
.DS_Store

._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# IDE Files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-*

# Documentation temporary files
~$*.docx
~$*.pptx
~$*.xlsx

build/
dist/
debug/
release/
